title: Check Asset Maintenance History
description: Before purchasing a used piece of heavy equipment, a manager wants to review its maintenance history.

tasks.description: Get the serial number of the equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the unique identifier for the asset.

tasks.description: Query the manufacturer's database for all warranty and service work performed on that serial number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the full service history from the manufacturer.

tasks.description: Review the history for any major failures or recurring problems to inform the purchase decision.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the history and finds a recurring hydraulic issue, which is a key factor in the decision.
